text:
-13-
APPENDIX B
NAEB NETWORK MEMBERSHIP 1951-1956
The small decline in Network membership in recent years has been due
to the gradual increase in Network assessment fees as the Network has
become self-supporting. Many smaller stations operate on such a small
budget that even the modest assessment fee is prohibitive. However,
it is encouraging to note that during the year several stations that
earlier had to drop out of the Network due to increasing fees have
later been able to rejoin, after an internal budgetary adjustment#
